src:
Emprunt: BoS Funding lève 100 millions de francs
04 Nov 2019, 16:54 by AWP

Le taux est fixé à 1,500% et l’échéance est en 2023.

BoS Funding (Bank of Sharjah P.J.S.C) émet un emprunt sous direction de Commerzbank et Credit Suisse. Les conditions:



Montant 

100 millions de francs



Taux

1,500% 



Prix d'émission

100,164%



Durée

4 ans, jus. 29.11.2023



Rating

BBB+ (Fitch)



Libération

29.11.2019



Yield to Mat.

1,4575%



Ecart de swap

+205 pb



No valeur

46’123’887 (2)



Cotation 

SIX, dès le 27.11.2019



Articles Associés
text:
Loan: BoS Funding raises 100 million francs
04 Nov 2019, 16:54 by AWP

The rate is fixed at 1,500% and the deadline is in 2023.

BoS Funding (Bank of Sharjah P.J.S.C) issues a subordinated loan of Commerzbank and Credit Suisse. Conditions:



Amount

100 million francs



Rate

1.500%



Issue price

100.164%



duration

4 years old, juice 11/29/2023



Rating

BBB + (Fitch)



Release

11/29/2019



Yield to Mat.

1.4575%



Swap gap

+205 pb



No value

46'123'887 (2)



Quote

SIX, from 27.11.2019
